languages.text: "Вашими стараниями, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Эти слепые теперь повсюду в городе — мятежники, сволочи такие, хватают кого ни попадя и калечат, глаза жгут. А потом они, спятившие от боли, бродят и всякую чушь бормочут".

"All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. Those blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling nonsense."
languages.original_text: "Вашими стараниями, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Эти слепые теперь повсюду в городе — мятежники, сволочи такие, хватают кого ни попадя и калечат, глаза жгут. А потом они, спятившие от боли, бродят и всякую чушь бормочут".

traits.locale_text: "All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. These blind lunatics are all over the city right now — the rebels, damn them to the void, grab people from the street and maim them, burn their eyes out. Then they leave them to wander around the city, babbling about some nonsense."

"All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. These blind lunatics are all over the city right now — the rebels, damn them to the void, grab people from the street and maim them, burn their eyes out. Then they leave them to wander around the city, babbling about some nonsense."

"All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. These blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling some nonsense."

"All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. These blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling some nonsense."

"All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. Those blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling nonsense."

"All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. Those blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling nonsense."

languages.text: "Und das nur dank Euch, {mf|Lord|Lady}. Diese blinden Wahnsinnigen haben die Stadt überrannt! Diese Rebellen, möge die Leere sie verfluchen, verstümmeln jeden, der ihnen über den Weg läuft, brennen allen die Augen aus. Dann lassen sie ihre armen Opfer durch die Straßen taumeln. Der Schmerz treibt sie in den Wahnsinn und sie reden nur noch wirres Zeug."
languages.original_text: "All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. Those blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling nonsense."

traits.locale_text: "Und das nur dank Euch, {mf|Lord|Lady}. Diese blinden Wahnsinnigen haben die Stadt überrannt! Diese Rebellen, möge die Leere sie verfluchen, verstümmeln jeden, der ihnen über den Weg läuft, brennen allen die Augen aus. Dann lassen sie ihre armen Opfer durch die Straßen taumeln. Der Schmerz treibt sie in den Wahnsinn und sie reden nur noch wirres Zeug."

languages.text: « Non, et c'est grâce à vous, Votre Seigneurie... Ces cinglés ont envahi toute la ville, ils mutilent tous ceux sur lesquels ils mettent la main en leur arrachant les yeux, avant de les abandonner fous de douleur à errer dans les rues en bredouillant des insanités. »
languages.original_text: "All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. Those blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling nonsense."

traits.locale_text: « Non, et c'est grâce à vous, Votre Seigneurie... Ces cinglés ont envahi toute la ville, ils mutilent tous ceux sur lesquels ils mettent la main en leur arrachant les yeux, avant de les abandonner fous de douleur à errer dans les rues en bredouillant des insanités. »

languages.text: “多亏了您，大人，这座城市里到处都是这些瞎了眼的疯子！那群叛乱分子，愿虚空吞噬他们，他们到处残害他们遇到的人，还会烧掉那些可怜人的眼睛。之后，他们让那些被痛苦逼疯的人一边在街上游荡，一边传播各种胡言乱语。”
languages.original_text: "All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. Those blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling nonsense."

traits.locale_text: “多亏了您，大人，这座城市里到处都是这些瞎了眼的疯子！那群叛乱分子，愿虚空吞噬他们，他们到处残害他们遇到的人，还会烧掉那些可怜人的眼睛。之后，他们让那些被痛苦逼疯的人一边在街上游荡，一边传播各种胡言乱语。”

languages.text: 「陛下のおかげです。こうした盲目の狂人が今も街中にはびこっているんです！反逆者め、ヴォイドに落ちろって感じですよ。手当たり次第、奴らは捕まえた人々を傷つけ、目を焼き潰して回っています。残ったのは痛みで気が狂った哀れな者たちで、わけのわからないことをぶつぶつ言いながら通りを徘徊してます」
languages.original_text: "All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. Those blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling nonsense."

traits.locale_text: 「閣下のおかげです。こうした盲目の狂人が今も街中にはびこっているんです！反逆者め、ヴォイドに落ちろって感じですよ。手当たり次第、目につき次第、片っ端からひどい傷を負わされるんです。残ったのは痛みで気が狂った貧乏人どもで、わけのわからないことをぶつぶつ言いながら通りを徘徊してます」

languages.text: «Gracias a usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¡Estos lunáticos están por toda la ciudad! Estos rebeldes, malditos sean al vacío, van por ahí mutilando a quien pillan y abrasándoles los ojos. Luego dejan a los pobres desgraciados locos de dolor vagando por las calles, balbuceando alguna tontería».
languages.original_text: "All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. Those blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling nonsense."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias a usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¡Estos lunáticos están por toda la ciudad! Estos rebeldes, malditos sean al vacío, van por ahí mutilando a quien pillan y abrasándoles los ojos. Luego dejan a los pobres desgraciados locos de dolor vagando por las calles, balbuceando alguna tontería».

languages.text: "Sayenizde yok {mf|lordum|leydim}. O kör deliler tüm şehri sarmış durumda! Bu uçsuz alasıca asiler, ellerine geçirdikleri herkesi kötürüm edip gözlerini dağlıyor. Sonra da acıdan çıldırıp saçma sapan konuşan zavallıları sokağa salıp gidiyorlar."
languages.original_text: "All thanks to you, my {mf|lord|lady}. Those blind lunatics are all over the city right now! These rebels, damn them to the void, go around maiming anyone they get their hands on and scorching their eyes. Then they leave the poor sods driven mad by the pain to wander the streets, babbling nonsense."

traits.locale_text: "Sayenizde yok {mf|lordum|leydim}. O kör deliler tüm şehri sarmış durumda! Bu uçsuz alasıca asiler, ellerine geçirdikleri herkesi kötürüm edip gözlerini dağlıyor. Sonra da acıdan çıldırıp saçma sapan konuşan zavallıları sokağa salıp gidiyorlar."
